fields.Title: Untold Stories: African American Civil Rights Movement in Idaho 1941-1976
fields.Outlet (if applicable): State Historic Preservation Office/National Park Service
fields.Publisher: State Historic Preservation Office/National Park Service
fields.Description/Abstract: Historical Context document for National Park Service Civil Rights Project Grant, Idaho State Historic Preservation Office. Is an NPS/SHPO government document, is electronically available for the public as part of this national civil rights project. Accepted at SHPO Dec 2019. Published by National Park Service 2021. Used to preserve several historic sites in Idaho's civil rights history. See here for details: <a href="https://www.idahostatesman.com/news/local/community/boise/article263668368.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">https://www.idahostatesman.com/news/local/community/boise/article263668368.html</a>  Note: Chair, Lisa Brady, noted that this 66 pg report of original research will be counted by her as worth two original articles, due to the fact that it is over double the length and density of most peer reviewed journal publications and book chapters. See attachment of chair's recognition.

attachments.filename: Brady supports counting NPS & CRts essays as double 4.23.pdf
